title: Validation Cloud Raises $15M Series A to Bring Data x AI to Web3
body: Zug, Switzerland, March 6th, 2025, Chainwire Validation Cloud , the leading Web3 infrastructure platform, has announced its $15 million Series A funding round led by True Global Ventures. The investment accelerates growth in Staking, Node API, and Data x AI, driving business intelligence unmatched in the market for blockchain networks, protocols, and applications, including Chainlink, Aptos, Consensys, Stellar, and Hedera. Powering Web3 Market Growth Validation Cloud is on a mission to expand the GDP of Web3 by providing the core infrastructure enterprises rely on to scale interactions on blockchain networks, ensuring compliance while facilitating seamless asset participation. With over $1.5B in staked assets across 50+ protocols, Validation Cloud delivers the critical infrastructure required for institutional-grade engagement, backed by rigorous security standards. The company's Staking and Node API services have been ranked #1 for over two years in global performance metrics, as measured by third-party benchmarking services. The Series A round includes participation from previous investors Cadenza, Blockchain Founders Fund, Bloccelerate, Blockwall, Side Door Ventures, Metamatic, GS Futures, and AP Capital, demonstrating strong continued confidence in Validation Cloud's vision and execution. Transforming Web3 Data Access The investment will accelerate Validation Cloud‚Äôs expansion into data and AI, redefining how organizations harness blockchain intelligence. By dramatically reducing time-to-value from hours to seconds, the platform unlocks real-time, AI-driven insights that power smarter decisions across blockchain ecosystems. This breakthrough enables enterprises, applications, and users to access personalized, high-impact intelligence instantly, transforming blockchain engagement. "This strategic investment accelerates our mission to expand the GDP of Web3 by facilitating every interaction and transaction," said Alex Nwaka, Co-Founder and Chief Strategy Officer of Validation Cloud. "Our enterprise-grade infrastructure, combined with cutting-edge AI capabilities, is establishing the industry standard for performance, reliability, and Web3 data-driven intelligence." ‚ÄúValidation Cloud has a proven track record in Web3 infrastructure excellence and True Global Ventures is honored to support its next stage of growth. Through its pioneering innovation in data x AI, the company is defining a completely new category in digital assets, transforming how enterprises, applications, and users engage with blockchains,‚Äù said Beatrice Lion, CEO and General Partner of True Global Ventures. Defining Standards for World-Class Infrastructure The company's rapid growth is reflective of the market‚Äôs need for performance, scalability, and compliance; the core design tenets of Validation Cloud‚Äôs platform. Its success, evidenced by a 500% year-over-year increase in staked assets, alongside the #1 ranking for Node API performance, reflects the establishment of Web2 standards as the prevailing norm in Web3. Further, burgeoning enterprise demand for reliable, high-performance Web3 infrastructure, particularly among financial institutions and large-scale blockchain networks requires institutional-grade security and compliance standards. With its comprehensive platform approach, Validation Cloud is uniquely positioned to address enterprise demand for reliable, high-performance Web3 infrastructure, particularly among financial institutions and large-scale blockchain networks requiring institutional-grade security and compliance standards. About Validation Cloud Validation Cloud is the leading Web3 x AI company revolutionizing access to blockchain data, compressing the time to value from hours to seconds, and delivering business intelligence to blockchains and their ecosystems. Users can keep up with them on X , LinkedIn , YouTube , their blog , and the High Stakes Podcast . About True Global Ventures TGV 4 Plus Fund invests in AI and blockchain-driven companies globally. TGV backs visionary entrepreneurs in sectors including AI, entertainment, technology infrastructure, and financial services in the early stages and beyond Series B. They can be found on X and LinkedIn . Contact Mr Jamie Kingsley Validation Cloud j.kingsley@theprgenius.com

title: Unlock Potential Gains: Ethereum‚Äôs MVRV Z-Score Hits Rock Bottom, Igniting Hope
body: Is the crypto winter finally thawing? For Ethereum enthusiasts, there‚Äôs a glimmer of hope on the horizon. A key on-chain metric, the Ethereum Market Value to Realized Value (MVRV) Z-Score, has just plunged to a 17-month low, a level historically associated with significant undervaluation and potential market bottoms. Could this be the signal smart investors have been waiting for to strategically position themselves for the next Ethereum surge? Decoding the Ethereum MVRV Z-Score: Is it a Buy Signal? The Ethereum MVRV Z-Score might sound like complex jargon, but it‚Äôs a powerful tool for gauging market sentiment and identifying potential buying opportunities. Think of it as a temperature gauge for the Ethereum market. It essentially tells us whether Ethereum is overvalued or undervalued by comparing its market capitalization (market value) to its realized capitalization (realized value). Realized cap attempts to value ETH based on the price each coin last moved on the blockchain, offering a potentially more accurate reflection of investor investment than market cap alone. The Z-Score part adds another layer of insight. It uses standard deviation to normalize the difference between market cap and realized cap. In simpler terms, a low MVRV Z-Score suggests that the market cap is significantly lower than the realized cap, indicating potential Ethereum undervaluation . Conversely, a high score might signal overvaluation and a potential price correction. Currently, as reported by Glassnode, the Ethereum MVRV Z-Score has descended into territory that historically precedes bullish reversals. Let‚Äôs break down what this means: 17-Month Low: This isn‚Äôt just a minor dip. Hitting a 17-month low signifies a substantial correction and prolonged period of market pressure. Approaching the Green Zone: The ‚Äúgreen zone‚Äù is a term often used by analysts to describe the lower end of the MVRV Z-Score range, historically indicating undervaluation. When the score enters this zone, it suggests that Ethereum is trading at a discount compared to its on-chain value. Historical Precedent: The crucial point! Similar dips in the Ethereum MVRV Z-Score in October 2023, December 2022, and the infamous March 2020 crash were followed by significant ETH price rallies. This historical pattern lends credence to the current low score being a potential bottom signal. Why is the MVRV Z-Score Important for Crypto Investors? Understanding and monitoring metrics like the Ethereum MVRV Z-Score offers several key benefits for cryptocurrency investors: Identifying Potential Entry Points: As highlighted, a low MVRV Z-Score can act as a powerful signal for identifying potential market bottoms and strategic entry points for buying Ethereum. It helps investors move beyond just price charts and consider on-chain fundamentals. Assessing Market Sentiment: The MVRV Z-Score reflects the overall sentiment of the Ethereum market. A low score indicates widespread fear and potential capitulation, which can ironically be the best time to buy as the market is likely oversold. Risk Management: Conversely, a high MVRV Z-Score can warn of potential market tops and overvaluation, prompting investors to consider taking profits or reducing their exposure to ETH. Data-Driven Decision Making: In the volatile world of crypto, relying on data-driven metrics like the MVRV Z-Score can lead to more informed and less emotionally driven investment decisions. Whale Accumulation: Are Smart Money Investors Piling into ETH? Adding further fuel to the bullish narrative is the significant ETH accumulation activity observed on-chain. Data reveals that addresses holding substantial amounts of Ethereum ‚Äì particularly whales ‚Äì are aggressively buying the dip. Record Daily Inflows: ETH accumulation addresses have witnessed their highest daily inflows in years. This indicates a strong influx of ETH into wallets known for long-term holding, suggesting a belief in Ethereum‚Äôs future potential. Whale Behavior (1,000‚Äì10,000 ETH Holders): The data specifically points to whales holding between 1,000 and 10,000 ETH as being particularly active buyers. These are sophisticated investors with significant capital and resources, and their accumulation patterns are often seen as a strong indicator of market direction. ‚ÄúBuying the Dip‚Äù Mentality: The current market conditions, with the MVRV Z-Score signaling undervaluation, appear to be triggering a classic ‚Äúbuy the dip‚Äù strategy among these large holders. They are capitalizing on lower prices to increase their ETH holdings, anticipating future price appreciation. Navigating the Crypto Market Bottom: Challenges and Considerations While the signals from the crypto market bottom indicators like the MVRV Z-Score and whale accumulation are encouraging, it‚Äôs crucial to approach the market with a balanced perspective and acknowledge the inherent challenges: Market Volatility: Cryptocurrency markets are notoriously volatile. Even with positive on-chain metrics, unforeseen macroeconomic events, regulatory changes, or black swan events can trigger further price drops. No Guarantees: Historical patterns are not guarantees of future performance. While past MVRV Z-Score dips preceded rallies, there‚Äôs no certainty that this pattern will repeat exactly. Identifying the True Bottom: Pinpointing the absolute bottom of a market is incredibly difficult, if not impossible. The MVRV Z-Score provides a signal of potential undervaluation, but the price could still decline further before a sustained recovery. Risk Management is Key: Investing in cryptocurrencies, especially during market downturns, carries significant risk. Proper risk management strategies, including diversification and only investing what you can afford to lose, are paramount. Further Research Required: The MVRV Z-Score and whale accumulation are just two pieces of the puzzle. Investors should conduct thorough research, consider other indicators, and stay informed about broader market trends before making any investment decisions. Actionable Insights: Seizing Potential Opportunities in Ethereum So, what are the actionable takeaways from this analysis? While this is not financial advice, the current confluence of a low Ethereum MVRV Z-Score and significant whale accumulation suggests a potentially opportune moment for strategic investors. Here are some insights to consider: Further Research: Dive deeper into on-chain analytics platforms like Glassnode to track the MVRV Z-Score and whale accumulation trends in real-time. Explore other relevant metrics to get a comprehensive market picture. Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): Consider employing a dollar-cost averaging strategy to gradually build your ETH position over time. This approach mitigates the risk of trying to time the market perfectly and allows you to average out your entry price. Long-Term Perspective: If you believe in the long-term potential of Ethereum and its ecosystem, a market dip signaled by metrics like the MVRV Z-Score can be viewed as a chance to acquire ETH at a discounted price for long-term holding. Stay Informed: Keep abreast of the latest developments in the crypto space, including regulatory updates, technological advancements, and macroeconomic factors that could impact the market. Conclusion: A Hopeful Glimpse Amid Market Uncertainty Ethereum‚Äôs MVRV Z-Score reaching a 17-month low, coupled with aggressive whale accumulation, paints a potentially hopeful picture for ETH and the broader crypto market. While challenges and uncertainties remain, these on-chain signals suggest that we might be approaching a significant market bottom. For astute investors, this could represent a strategic window to unlock potential gains as Ethereum positions itself for its next bullish cycle. Remember to conduct thorough research and manage risk responsibly in this dynamic market. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price action.

title: Superstate registers transfer agent with the SEC
body: Superstate, an on-chain asset management firm, has announced that it has registered its blockchain-based transfer agent, Superstate Services LLC, with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. The registration of the digital transfer agent aligns with Superstate‚Äôs goal of using blockchain technology to advance the integration of tokenized securities. Ensuring compliance with existing regulatory frameworks while bringing real-world assets on-chain is Superstate Services LLC‚Äôs top priority, the company said in a blog post . The tokenized securities market benefits from transfer agents, whether issuers or markets, in tracking the ownership, issuance, and redemption of shares. With transfer agents in place, issuers can focus on business growth and operations while ensuring effective governance and boosting shareholder confidence. Superstate‚Äôs agent services aim to bring these advantages to the market, enabling issuers to leverage the asset manager‚Äôs on-chain record-keeping system for real-time ownership monitoring. ‚ÄúInitially, Superstate Services will only support our Superstate Funds as we seek to broaden their distribution. But, we aim for Superstate Services to be a crucial enabling service provider to all issuers as more securities become tokenized,‚Äù the company said. You might also like: Bitwise partners with Maple Finance to enter on-chain credit markets The asset manager‚Äôs tokenized securities funds set to benefit from this include the Superstate Short Duration U.S. Government Securities Fund, USTB, and the Superstate Crypto Carry Fund, USCC. USTB allows qualified purchasers and accredited investors to explore investment opportunities via short-duration Treasury bills, while USCC offers institutional investors a crypto basis strategy. Per rwa.xyz , USTB has over $319 million in assets under management. The registration with the SEC comes amid broader pro-crypto sentiment on the regulatory scene in the U.S. Earlier this week, Commodity and Futures Trading Commission acting chair Caroline Pham said the CFTC and SEC were engaging amid efforts for further regulatory collaboration. Also notable are comments by SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce, who currently leads the securities watchdog‚Äôs crypto task force. In recent remarks, she stated that transfer agents could play a crucial role in the tokenized securities market as the industry seeks regulatory clarity. You might also like: Omni Network integrates Superstate‚Äôs USTB to optimize treasury strategy

title: Strategic Move: Brazilian Giant M√©liuz Approves Bold Bitcoin Treasury Allocation
body: Exciting news is breaking out of Brazil! M√©liuz (MELIUZ), a publicly traded Brazilian company, has just given the green light to a significant shift in its financial strategy. They‚Äôre not just dipping their toes into the cryptocurrency world; they‚Äôre making a bold move by allocating Bitcoin (BTC) to their corporate treasury. This decision, confirmed by Walter Bloomberg on X, is sending ripples through both the Brazilian and global crypto markets. What does this mean for the future of corporate Bitcoin adoption, and why is M√©liuz making this strategic leap? Let‚Äôs dive in and explore this fascinating development. Why Corporate Bitcoin Adoption is Gaining Momentum The idea of companies holding Bitcoin on their balance sheets, often referred to as corporate bitcoin adoption , has moved from a fringe concept to a serious consideration for businesses worldwide. Why are we seeing this increasing interest? Several compelling factors are at play: Hedge Against Inflation: In an era of rising inflation and economic uncertainty, Bitcoin is increasingly viewed as a digital gold ‚Äì a store of value that can potentially protect against the devaluation of fiat currencies. Companies are looking for ways to preserve their capital, and Bitcoin offers an alternative to traditional assets that might be eroded by inflation. Diversification of Treasury Assets: Smart financial management often involves diversification. Holding Bitcoin allows companies to diversify their treasury beyond traditional assets like cash and bonds. This diversification can potentially reduce overall portfolio risk and enhance returns. Potential for Higher Returns: While Bitcoin is known for its volatility, it also presents the potential for significant capital appreciation. Companies looking to enhance their treasury returns are attracted to Bitcoin‚Äôs growth potential, especially in the long term. Future-Proofing Finances: Embracing Bitcoin can be seen as a forward-thinking move, positioning companies at the forefront of technological and financial innovation. It signals to investors and customers that the company is adaptable and prepared for the future of finance. M√©liuz and the Brazil Bitcoin Landscape Brazil has been steadily emerging as a significant player in the Latin American cryptocurrency scene. With a tech-savvy population and a growing interest in digital assets, the country is ripe for Brazil Bitcoin adoption. M√©liuz, a well-established publicly listed company in Brazil, making this move is particularly noteworthy. What is M√©liuz, and why is their decision so impactful? M√©liuz is a Brazilian technology company known for its cashback and rewards platform. Being publicly listed on the Brazilian stock exchange (B3), their decision to allocate Bitcoin to their treasury adds a layer of legitimacy and visibility to the crypto space within the Brazilian financial market. This isn‚Äôt just a small startup; it‚Äôs a recognized entity making a significant statement. Impact of M√©liuz‚Äôs Decision M√©liuz‚Äôs move can have several positive impacts: Increased Confidence in Crypto in Brazil: A publicly listed Brazilian company adopting Bitcoin can boost confidence in cryptocurrencies among other Brazilian businesses and investors. It sets a precedent and encourages further exploration of digital assets. Potential for Follower Effect: M√©liuz‚Äôs decision could inspire other companies in Brazil and Latin America to consider Bitcoin treasury allocations. When a company of M√©liuz‚Äôs stature takes the plunge, it can pave the way for others to follow suit. Positive Signal for the Global Crypto Market: This news from Brazil adds to the growing narrative of institutional investment in Bitcoin globally. It reinforces the idea that Bitcoin is maturing as an asset class and attracting interest from established businesses beyond just tech companies. Navigating the Bitcoin Treasury Landscape: Benefits and Challenges While the potential benefits of a Bitcoin treasury allocation are clear, it‚Äôs essential to acknowledge the challenges and considerations companies face when making this decision. Let‚Äôs weigh the pros and cons: Benefits Challenges Inflation Hedge Diversification Potential for High Returns Enhanced Brand Image (Innovation) Decentralized Asset ‚Äì Reduced Counterparty Risk Price Volatility Regulatory Uncertainty (Varies by Jurisdiction) Accounting and Tax Complexities Custodial Risks (Secure Storage) Educational Curve (Understanding Bitcoin) Mitigating the Challenges Companies considering Bitcoin treasury allocations can mitigate the challenges by: Implementing Robust Risk Management Strategies: This includes setting clear allocation limits, understanding volatility, and potentially using hedging strategies. Staying Informed on Regulatory Developments: Keeping abreast of evolving regulations in their jurisdiction and globally is crucial for compliance. Seeking Expert Guidance: Consulting with crypto-savvy financial advisors, accountants, and legal professionals can help navigate the complexities. Prioritizing Secure Custody: Utilizing reputable and secure custody solutions for Bitcoin holdings is paramount to prevent loss or theft. Investing in Education: Educating internal teams about Bitcoin and cryptocurrency fundamentals is essential for informed decision-making and management. What‚Äôs Next for M√©liuz and Corporate Bitcoin? M√©liuz‚Äôs approval is just the first step. The actual implementation of their Bitcoin treasury allocation will be closely watched. Key questions remain: What percentage of their treasury will be allocated to Bitcoin? The size of the allocation will signal the level of their conviction and risk appetite. What custody solutions will they employ to secure their Bitcoin? Security is paramount for corporate holdings. How will this decision impact their financial performance and stock price? The market‚Äôs reaction will be a crucial indicator of the broader sentiment towards corporate Bitcoin adoption. M√©liuz‚Äôs move is undoubtedly a significant development in the ongoing story of corporate bitcoin adoption . It underscores the growing mainstream acceptance of Bitcoin as a legitimate treasury asset and signals a potentially exciting new chapter for both the cryptocurrency market and the future of corporate finance. Actionable Insights: Is Bitcoin Treasury Right for Your Company? Inspired by M√©liuz‚Äôs bold step and considering the growing trend of corporate Bitcoin adoption, businesses should evaluate if a Bitcoin treasury allocation aligns with their financial goals and risk tolerance. Here are some actionable steps to consider: Conduct Thorough Research: Deeply understand Bitcoin, its underlying technology, market dynamics, and potential risks and rewards. Assess Your Company‚Äôs Financial Situation: Determine if allocating a portion of your treasury to a potentially volatile asset like Bitcoin is financially prudent and aligns with your overall investment strategy. Define Clear Objectives: Establish specific goals for Bitcoin treasury allocation ‚Äì is it for inflation hedging, diversification, or long-term growth? Develop a Risk Management Framework: Create a robust risk management plan that addresses volatility, custody, regulatory compliance, and accounting considerations. Start Small and Learn: Consider starting with a small allocation to gain experience and understanding before making larger commitments. Seek Expert Consultation: Engage with financial advisors, crypto experts, and legal professionals to navigate the complexities and ensure compliance. In conclusion, M√©liuz‚Äôs decision to embrace Bitcoin for their treasury marks a significant milestone in the cryptocurrency‚Äôs journey toward mainstream acceptance. It‚Äôs a powerful signal that Bitcoin is not just a speculative asset but a strategic tool for forward-thinking companies looking to diversify their holdings and potentially enhance their financial future. As more companies like M√©liuz explore this path, the landscape of corporate finance may be on the cusp of a profound and exciting transformation. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: Texas Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Bill Passes The Senate
body: Bitcoin Magazine Texas Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Bill Passes The Senate Today, the Texas Senate has passed SB 21, a bill aimed at creating a strategic Bitcoin reserve for the state, by a vote of 25-5. The bill will now advance to the Texas House for further consideration. JUST IN: Texas Strategic Bitcoin Reserve legislation SB 21 PASSES the Senate. pic.twitter.com/NahQC7z63K ‚Äî Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) March 6, 2025 Texas Lieutenant Governor Dan Patrick identified SB 21 as a priority bill for the 2025 legislative session this past January. The bill aims to position Texas as a leader in Bitcoin adoption by establishing a reserve of BTC, which proponents argue will serve as a hedge against economic instability and inflation. Support for the bill was evident during a February 18 hearing held by Texas‚Äô Senate Committee on Business and Commerce. The hearing drew numerous Bitcoin advocates, including Pierre Rochard of Riot Platforms, North America‚Äôs largest Bitcoin mining company. Speaking in favor of the bill, Rochard stated, ‚ÄúBitcoin will continue to accrue long-term value, so now is the perfect time to make a strategic investment.‚Äù JUST IN ‚Äì Riot Platform's Pierre Rochard to the Texas State Senate: "Bitcoin will continue to accrue long term value, so now is the perfect time to make a strategic investment." pic.twitter.com/45wBBS5TlV ‚Äî Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) February 18, 2025 Senate Committee on Business and Commerce Chairman Charles Schwertner also emphasized Bitcoin‚Äôs growing role in financial markets, saying, ‚ÄúBitcoin, referenced as digital gold by the US Treasury, has become a recognized asset in the financial markets.‚Äù JUST IN: Texas Senate holds public hearing on Strategic Bitcoin Reserve legislation "Bitcoin, referenced as digital gold by the US Treasury, has become a recognized asset in the financial markets." pic.twitter.com/g13UXMtNjM ‚Äî Bitcoin Magazine (@BitcoinMagazine) February 18, 2025 The bill‚Äôs passage in the Senate comes amid growing national interest in Bitcoin reserves. Just days ago, President Donald Trump announced that the United States would be creating a federal Bitcoin reserve. President Trump is expected to provide further details on the federal Bitcoin reserve during the upcoming Digital Assets Summit at the White House tomorrow, based on Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick‚Äôs comments yesterday. Lutnick said that an official announcement is expected soon, stating, ‚ÄúA Bitcoin strategic reserve is something the President‚Äôs interested in. He spoke about it all during the campaign trail, and I think you‚Äôre going to see it executed on Friday.‚Äù As SB 21 moves to the Texas House, all eyes are on whether Texas will successfully establish itself as a leader in Bitcoin adoption at the state level. If passed, Texas could become the first U.S. state to officially hold Bitcoin as part of its financial strategy, setting a precedent for other states to follow. SB 21 is getting close to the finish line of becoming officially signed into law. More updates on the status of SB 21 and other U.S. Bitcoin reserve legislation can also be found on Bitcoin Laws . Texas Bitcoin Reserve Bill SB21 now moves to the House. Not at the finish line quite yet. pic.twitter.com/qc0myg0H2C ‚Äî Bitcoin Laws (@Bitcoin_Laws) March 6, 2025 This post Texas Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Bill Passes The Senate first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Nik .

title: Whale Pressure Drops as Ethereum Faces Sharp Decline: Here‚Äôs the Impact on ETH Price
body: The post Whale Pressure Drops as Ethereum Faces Sharp Decline: Here‚Äôs the Impact on ETH Price appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Following several announcements regarding tariffs by Donald Trump, the crypto market has faced increased downward volatility. As a result, the price of Ethereum (ETH) dropped below the critical $2,000 mark, leading to a surge in long liquidations. Amid this, various on-chain metrics for Ethereum turned bearish, suggesting a drop in accumulation. However, analysts anticipate a strong rebound in the price of ETH ahead of the upcoming crypto summit. Whale Pressure Drops Amid ETH‚Äôs Dip Recent data from Coinglass shows equal trading activity as Ethereum remains under the $2,500 mark. In the past 24 hours, Ethereum faced a total liquidation of approximately $47.87 million, with buyers liquidating $28.1 million and sellers closing $19.7 million in short positions. In the meantime, key investors are utilizing the opportunity to purchase Ethereum at lower prices, especially ahead of the upcoming White House Crypto Summit. Traders are particularly focused on the activity of wallet addresses associated with Trump-endorsed World Liberty Financial (WLF). Also read: Trump‚Äôs WLFI Buys $10M in Ethereum Despite Losses ‚Äì Here‚Äôs Why According to Arkham Intel, an on-chain intelligence firm, WLF‚Äôs wallet has tripled its Ether holdings within just one day. WLF has been actively buying up Ethereum during recent price dips. Reports from Arkham Intel reveal that as of Thursday, WLF holds approximately 7,100 Ethereum tokens, valued at over $80 million. This substantial increase from 2,500 tokens in just 24 hours highlights a strong accumulation strategy. Data from IntoTheBlock reveals a significant decline in whale activity for Ethereum, coinciding with considerable losses due to Ethereum‚Äôs price drop. The count of whale transactions has notably decreased, falling from a high of 13.4K transactions to just 6.46K. Furthermore, there has been a drastic drop in the volume of large transactions, which plummeted from $11 billion to $5.5 billion. This decline in whale pressure came following a negative trend in large holders‚Äô unrealized profit. CryptoQuant data indicates that ETH whales, specifically those with holdings ranging from 1,000 to 10,000 ETH and from 10,000 to 100,000 ETH, have experienced a shift to negative unrealized profits. What‚Äôs Next for ETH Price? The ETH price recovered toward $2,300 as it faced buying pressure. However, it failed to surge further as bears strongly defended the resistance level. As of writing, Ethereum price trades at $2,200, dropping over 0.9% in the last 24 hours. The ETH/USDT trading pair is struggling to approach the immediate resistance line at $2,530. This level could be a major obstacle as STHs might continue to liquidate here. However, buyers might soon break above that level as demand surges. If the price holds below the EMA20 trend line on the 1-hour chart, the sellers will likely try to push it back down to $2K. However, with the RSI level continuing to trade around the midline at level 45, it might trigger a retest of the resistance channel. If the price manages to hold above $2,530, it would favor the buyers. The trading pair could then increase to $2,935.

title: Kraken Set to Begin Next Round of FTX Repayments
body: FTX Derivative Exchange‚Äôs plan to repay creditors is moving forward, with Kraken reportedly set to begin the second phase of payments on May 30. This follows the first round in February, which focused on smaller claims. As reported, the next phase will include a wider group of creditors, covering those with both small and large claims. Bigger Claims to Be Paid Next The first batch of payments went to creditors with $50,000 or less claims . At the time, blockchain analytics firm Arkham Intelligence reported that about $1.2 billion had been withdrawn from FTX-controlled wallets. With the new phase, bigger claims will also be processed. Regarding the above, FTX creditors‚Äô representative Sunil Kavuri allegedly shared an email from Kraken confirming that both small and large claims would be included this time. However, as of the time of writing, Kraken has not released any official statement. Meanwhile, the timing matches what FTX had previously announced, indicating that things are still on track. Even so, many creditors are unsure when they will receive their full payments. Some Creditors Still Left Out It is important to state that despite the progress, not all affected users will get their money back in this round. For example, creditors in countries like China, Russia, Egypt, Nigeria, and Ukraine have not received any payments yet. These regions had many FTX users, yet they were left out of the first batch of repayments. Again, the representative said that FTX is looking for ways to resolve this issue, but there is no clear timeline for when these customers will be paid. Unfortunately, the delay has frustrated many people as they are still waiting for answers. FTX Moves More Solana as Repayments Continue As FTX works through its repayment plans, it has been unstaking large amounts of Solana (SOL). Earlier this month, blockchain analytics firm Spot On Chain reported that FTX and Alameda Research unlocked 3.03 million SOL worth about $432.5 million and moved the tokens to different wallets. This was the biggest unstaking event for FTX and Alameda since November 2023. They plan to release 11.2 million SOL valued at roughly $1.5 billion. Since late 2023, they have sold 7.83 million SOL worth around $986 million through exchanges like Coinbase and Binance. FTX may be using its crypto holdings to help fund repayments, but it is still unclear how much money will go directly to creditors. The post Kraken Set to Begin Next Round of FTX Repayments appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Russian Crypto Exchange Garantex Halts Services As Tether Targets Sanctioned Wallets
body: Sanctioned Russian crypto exchange Garantex is announcing the suspension of its operations after Tether blocked its platform‚Äôs wallets. In a new Telegram announcement on Thursday, the Russian exchange says that Tether has blocked Garantex‚Äôs wallets, which contained over 2.5 billion rubles, about $28 million. ‚ÄúDear users! We have bad news. Tether has entered the war against the Russian crypto market and blocked our wallets worth more than 2.5 billion rubles. We are temporarily suspending all services, including cryptocurrency withdrawals, while our entire team solves this problem. We are fighting and will not give up! Please note that all USDT in Russian wallets is currently under threat. As always, we are the first but not the last. Garantex Team.‚Äù The European Union (EU) included Garantex in Russian sanctions last month, accusing Garantex of guilt by association with Russian banks that allegedly helped the country evade EU sanctions. This is not the first time Tether has actively worked with regulators to disrupt USDT in sanctioned wallets. In September of last year, Tether announced that, in conjunction with the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ), it had seized over $6 million in wrongfully obtained crypto in Southeast Asia. When Reuters asked for a comment, a Tether spokesperson requested that all questions be directed to the U.S. Secret Service. title: Reddit Co-Founder Wants To Acquire TikTok and Put the Social Media Giant ‚ÄòOn-Chain‚Äô
body: Venture capitalist and Reddit co-founder Alexis Ohanian has joined billionaire Frank McCourt‚Äôs bid to take over TikTok‚Äôs US operations. In January, McCourt‚Äôs internet advocacy organization Project Liberty announced a formal offer to acquire TikTok US with plans to allow users to control how their data will be used and shared. According to Reuters , Ohanian will help promote Project Liberty‚Äôs bid to buy TikTok‚Äôs US assets as a strategic adviser specializing in social media. Ohanian confirmed the report in a post on the social media platform X. ‚ÄúExciting news for the digital world‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm officially now one of the people trying to buy TikTok US ‚Äì and bring it on-chain. TikTok has been a game-changer for creators, and its future should be built by them.‚Äù He says enabling users to control their data and determine how their information is used will be a significant improvement for TikTok. ‚ÄúUsers should own their data. Creators should own their audience. Period. Frequency will empower these principles to become reality. And with transparency and accountability at the core, this new TikTok won‚Äôt just be fairer ‚Äì it‚Äôll be GREATER.‚Äù Ohanian says the goal is to set a new standard for digital communities. ‚ÄúA TikTok for the people, by the people. title: Exciting News: NEOPIN Announces Groundbreaking Migration to Solana‚Äôs DeFi Ecosystem
body: Get ready for a significant shift in the decentralized finance (DeFi) landscape! NEOPIN, a prominent non-custodial DeFi protocol, has just dropped a bombshell announcement: they are migrating their entire ecosystem to Solana. This exciting development promises to inject fresh energy into both the NEOPIN platform and the broader Solana DeFi ecosystem. Let‚Äôs dive into what this migration means, what Project Titan is all about, and why this is a noteworthy move in the ever-evolving crypto world. NEOPIN Migration: A Bold Leap into the Solana Ecosystem NEOPIN, known for its permissioned DeFi protocol that prioritizes security and user empowerment, is taking a bold step to enhance its global reach and technological capabilities. The decision to migrate to Solana is a strategic one, aimed at leveraging Solana‚Äôs high-speed, low-cost infrastructure to fuel NEOPIN‚Äôs growth and innovation. This isn‚Äôt just a simple platform upgrade; it‚Äôs a complete ecosystem migration, signifying NEOPIN‚Äôs commitment to staying at the forefront of DeFi advancements. But why Solana? Well, Solana has rapidly become a powerhouse in the blockchain space, lauded for its: Scalability: Solana‚Äôs architecture is designed to handle thousands of transactions per second (TPS), far exceeding many other blockchains. This scalability is crucial for DeFi protocols aiming for mass adoption. Low Transaction Fees: Compared to networks like Ethereum, Solana boasts incredibly low transaction fees, often a fraction of a cent. This makes DeFi more accessible and cost-effective for users. Growing Ecosystem: Solana‚Äôs ecosystem is vibrant and expanding, with a plethora of DeFi projects, NFTs, and innovative applications. This rich environment provides fertile ground for NEOPIN to thrive and collaborate. Technological Advancements: Solana continues to push technological boundaries, constantly upgrading and improving its network to maintain its edge. For NEOPIN, these factors translate to a more efficient, user-friendly, and future-proof platform. The migration to Solana is poised to unlock new possibilities for NEOPIN users and the protocol itself. Unveiling Project Titan: NEOPIN‚Äôs AI-Powered DeFi Revolution Alongside the migration announcement, NEOPIN is introducing ‚ÄúProject Titan,‚Äù an ambitious initiative that signals a significant leap forward in their DeFi strategy. While details are still emerging, Project Titan is strongly hinted to be centered around integrating Artificial Intelligence (AI) into the NEOPIN DeFi protocol. This is not just about adding buzzwords; AI integration in DeFi holds the potential to: Enhance Security: AI can be used to detect and prevent fraudulent activities, bolster smart contract security, and provide real-time risk assessments. Optimize Yield Strategies: AI algorithms can analyze vast amounts of market data to identify and execute optimal yield farming and staking strategies, maximizing returns for users. Personalize User Experience: AI can tailor DeFi services to individual user needs and risk profiles, making the platform more intuitive and user-friendly. Improve Governance: AI can assist in analyzing governance proposals and voting patterns, potentially leading to more informed and efficient decision-making within the protocol. The governance vote for Project Titan, scheduled from March 11th to 18th, indicates that NEOPIN values community input and decentralized decision-making. This vote will likely determine the specifics and roadmap of Project Titan, making it a crucial moment for NEOPIN users and the broader community to participate and shape the future of this AI-powered DeFi venture. Solana DeFi Ecosystem: What Makes it So Attractive? The choice of Solana as the new home for NEOPIN‚Äôs ecosystem is no accident. Solana has rapidly ascended the ranks to become a leading blockchain platform, particularly within the DeFi sector. Let‚Äôs explore the key factors that make the Solana DeFi ecosystem so appealing, not just for NEOPIN, but for a multitude of projects and users: Feature Solana Ethereum (Comparison) Transaction Speed Thousands of TPS ~15-30 TPS Transaction Fees Extremely low (fractions of a cent) Can be high, especially during peak times Scalability Highly Scalable Currently scaling through Layer-2 solutions Ecosystem Growth Rapidly Growing DeFi, NFT, and App Ecosystem Mature and Extensive Ecosystem Energy Efficiency Proof-of-History (PoH) and Proof-of-Stake (PoS) ‚Äì more energy efficient Transitioning to Proof-of-Stake (PoS) As you can see, Solana offers a compelling combination of speed, affordability, and scalability, making it an ideal environment for DeFi protocols like NEOPIN to flourish. The vibrant Solana DeFi ecosystem already hosts a range of successful projects, creating a synergistic environment for innovation and collaboration. By joining this ecosystem, NEOPIN positions itself to tap into a wealth of resources, partnerships, and a thriving user base. Navigating the Challenges of Crypto Ecosystem Migration While the migration to Solana and the introduction of Project Titan are undoubtedly exciting, it‚Äôs important to acknowledge that ecosystem migrations in the crypto space are not without their challenges. NEOPIN will need to carefully navigate potential hurdles to ensure a smooth transition and maintain user confidence. Some potential challenges could include: Technical Complexity: Migrating a complex DeFi protocol to a new blockchain requires significant technical expertise and rigorous testing to avoid vulnerabilities and ensure seamless functionality. Community Transition: Educating and onboarding existing NEOPIN users to the Solana ecosystem is crucial. Clear communication, user-friendly tools, and support resources will be essential for a successful community transition. Security Audits: Comprehensive security audits of the migrated platform and smart contracts on Solana are paramount to safeguard user funds and maintain the integrity of the NEOPIN protocol. Maintaining Decentralization: As NEOPIN integrates AI and migrates to Solana, it‚Äôs crucial to uphold the principles of decentralization and transparency that are fundamental to DeFi. NEOPIN‚Äôs track record as a permissioned, non-custodial protocol suggests a strong commitment to security and user-centricity. Successfully overcoming these migration challenges will be key to realizing the full potential of this strategic move. Actionable Insights: Participating in NEOPIN Governance and Solana DeFi Growth For those interested in the future of NEOPIN and the Solana DeFi ecosystem, there are several actionable steps to consider: Participate in the Governance Vote: If you are a NEOPIN user or token holder, actively participate in the Project Titan governance vote from March 11th to 18th. Your voice matters in shaping the direction of this initiative. Explore Solana DeFi: Familiarize yourself with the Solana DeFi ecosystem. Explore different DeFi protocols, decentralized exchanges (DEXs), and yield farming opportunities on Solana. This will give you a broader understanding of the environment NEOPIN is entering. Stay Informed: Keep a close eye on NEOPIN‚Äôs official announcements and updates regarding the migration and Project Titan. Follow their social media channels and community forums to stay informed about the progress and key developments. Due Diligence: As with any investment in the crypto space, conduct thorough due diligence before engaging with NEOPIN on Solana. Understand the risks involved and make informed decisions based on your own research and risk tolerance. The NEOPIN migration to Solana represents a significant development with the potential to reshape both platforms. By staying informed and actively participating, you can position yourself to benefit from the growth and innovation unfolding in the crypto ecosystem. Conclusion: A New Chapter for NEOPIN and Solana DeFi NEOPIN‚Äôs announcement to migrate to Solana and introduce Project Titan marks an exciting new chapter for the DeFi protocol. This strategic move leverages Solana‚Äôs powerful infrastructure to propel NEOPIN‚Äôs growth, enhance user experience, and explore the transformative potential of AI in decentralized finance. As the governance vote for Project Titan approaches, the crypto community eagerly anticipates the next steps in this groundbreaking migration. The fusion of NEOPIN‚Äôs established DeFi expertise with Solana‚Äôs cutting-edge blockchain technology and AI innovation promises a dynamic and potentially revolutionary future for decentralized finance. Keep watching this space ‚Äì the evolution of the crypto ecosystem is happening right before our eyes! To learn more about the latest explore our article on key developments shaping Solana DeFi ecosystem and crypto market trends.

title: SafeWallet Releases Bybit Hack Post-Mortem Report, Calls for UI/UX Security Improvements
body: SafeWallet Bybit Hack Post-Mortem Report SafeWallet has published a post-mortem report analyzing the $1.4 billion Bybit hack, calling for enhanced security measures in UI/UX to protect against future attacks. How the Attack Unfolded SafeWallet and cybersecurity company Mandiant outline how the attackers compromised Bybit‚Äôs systems by taking over a Safe developer‚Äôs Amazon Web Services (AWS) session tokens, which allowed them to compromise the company‚Äôs multifactor authentication (MFA) security controls. SafeWallet‚Äôs AWS policies were set to reauthenticate every 12 hours. The attackers attempted to register an MFA device multiple times but failed. They then breached a developer‚Äôs MacOS system‚Äîlikely through malware‚Äîenabling them to use AWS session tokens as long as the developer‚Äôs sessions remained active. Once inside AWS, the hackers methodically mounted their attack, leveraging cloud-based security weaknesses to gain unauthorized access. North Korean Hackers Behind the Attack Mandiant‚Äôs forensic analysis confirmed that the attackers were state-sponsored North Korean hackers. They spent 19 days planning the attack before executing the breach. Despite the scale of the exploit, SafeWallet assured that its smart contracts remained intact. The company has since incorporated additional security protocols to prevent such an occurrence. FBI Issues Warning as Hackers Launder Stolen Funds The US Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) issued a public advisory, requesting node operators to halt transactions from wallet addresses linked to the North Korean hackers. The government agency cautioned that the stolen coins would be laundered and exchanged for fiat. Bybit hackers successfully laundered 100% of the stolen crypto within 10 days‚Äînearly 500,000 Ether-based tokens. Bybit CEO Ben Zhou noted that 77% of the funds worth about $1.07 billion are yet to be tracked on-chain, and some $280 million have disappeared into untouchable transactions. Security experts like Cyvers CEO Deddy Lavid are of the view that a possibility still remains to track and freeze some of the stolen funds despite the fast pace of the laundering process. As the crypto sector faces growing cyber attacks, SafeWallet‚Äôs report brings into focus the need to tighten security measures, especially within cloud-based systems.

NEAR Protocol historic price sentiment NEAR price history The Near Protocol (NEAR) began its journey in August 2020, aiming to create a scalable and permissionless blockchain. The first recorded trade value in October 2020 was $1.072, closing the year at $1.459 after a recovery. In 2021, NEAR showed an uptrend, starting at $1.305 and reaching an all-time high (ATH) of $7.572 by March 13. A market downturn pushed the price down to $1.537 by July 19, but it rebounded to $11.776 on September 9 and further to $13.168 on October 26. By 2022, NEAR‚Äôs price crashed to below $2.00, losing over 90% of its peak value. Throughout 2023, NEAR saw low volatility, with prices remaining below $2.50 for most of the year. Since the start of 2024, NEAR has experienced a strong recovery, climbing to $7.80. However, after reaching the $8.00 mark in mid-May, it fell back to $5.60. In June, NEAR traded between $4.48 and $7.66. It rose from $5.20 to $6.04 in July but closed the month below $5.00. NEAR started August at $5.00, declining to $3.89 by the end of the month. In September 2024, the asset bounced back and closed the month above the $5.20 mark. In October, the price stumbled and fell to $4.850 in the first few days before closing the month below the $4.00 mark leaving a negative outlook at the start of November. November saw NEAR making remarkable strides as the bulls held strong control of markets during the month, a trend that was expected to continue into December. However, the month saw NEAR plummet from heights of $7.00 to fall below $5 before closing the month. In January the price could not find a stable foothold and the price continued dwindling, closing the month just above $4.00 In February the price fell significantly towards the $3.00 mark and continued to decline ending the month at $2.80.

title: Binance‚Äôs Investment Arm Announces Investment in New Project Linked to Altcoin Also Listed on Its Exchange
body: YZi Labs, the investment arm of cryptocurrency exchange Binance, has announced a strategic investment in Tensorplex Labs, a decentralized AI lab focused on developing AI applications, infrastructure, and tools using decentralized technologies. This investment will allow Tensorplex to expand its team, accelerate research and development, and drive adoption of decentralized AI solutions. According to the announcement made by YZi Labs, Tensorplex Labs is at the forefront of the decentralized AI revolution by pioneering solutions that integrate blockchain with AI. The company‚Äôs main products include Tensorplex Dojo (Dojo), a foundational infrastructure designed to enhance human-AI collaboration, and Backprop Finance, a comprehensive DeFi hub for Bittensor. Dojo is a decentralized platform that improves AI models and agents by collecting human preferences and feedback data. The platform rewards contributors for their participation and aims to shape the future of Human-AI interaction by facilitating real-time collaboration between humans and AI agents. Related News: BREAKING: Coinbase Announces to List Three Altcoins in Futures With the recent Dynamic TAO (dTAO) upgrade on Bittensor, which offers an open market model for TAO emissions, Tensorplex has built Backprop Finance as a one-stop DeFi hub. The platform offers trading and analytics solutions for the dTAO tokens of the altnet, with plans to offer capital solutions powered by EVM smart contracts to further expand the Bittensor altnet economy. ‚ÄúWe at YZi Labs are bullish on AI and believe decentralization will play a key role in the evolution of this space,‚Äù said Andy Chang, Chief Investment Officer at YZi Labs. ‚ÄúTensorplex is leading this shift by enabling human expertise to shape AI development in new ways. This investment strengthens our case for decentralized AI, and we are excited to support their vision of creating a more open and collaborative AI ecosystem.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Binance‚Äôs Investment Arm Announces Investment in New Project Linked to Altcoin Also Listed on Its Exchange

title: SBF Shocked By Democrats‚Äô Crypto Stance Prior to FTX Collapse
body: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried suggested on Thursday in an interview with conservative pundit Tucker Carlson that one of the reasons he‚Äôd been given a harsh prison sentence was because he was getting closer to the Republican Party in the lead-up to his arrest. ‚ÄúOne fact that might be relevant. In 2020 I was center-left and I gave to Biden's campaign," he said. "I was optimistic he'd be a sort of solid center-left President. I spent the next few years in [Washington] DC a lot. I made dozens of trips there, and was really, really shocked by what I saw, not in a good direction, from the administration." ‚ÄúBy late 2022 I was giving to Republicans privately as much as Democrats. And that started becoming known right around FTX‚Äôs collapse, so that probably played a role,‚Äù Bankman-Fried added. Bankman-Fried was found guilty of multiple charges of fraud and conspiracy in March 2024 and sentenced to 25 years in prison. He made over $40 million in political donations to 196 members of Congress , including former Speaker of the House Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.) and former Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.). In other words, 1 in 3 lawmakers took money from him. Read more: Congress' FTX Problem: 1 in 3 Members Got Cash From Crypto Exchange's Bosses During Bankman-Fried's lengthy trial, it was revealed that he'd mulled a number of potential ways to rehab his public image following the collapse of FTX. An undated Google Doc listed ideas such as "come out against the woke agenda" and "Go on Tucker Carlsen, come out as a republican." With the GOP now firmly in power in D.C., the latter idea has now seemingly come to fruition. Bankman-Fried told Carlson that he‚Äôd never expected a whole lot from the Democrats but that he believed some lawmakers would prove thoughtful in both political parties. He criticized former Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chair Gary Gensler, calling the agency ‚Äúsomething out of a nightmare‚Äù during his tenure due to difficulties for crypto companies to come in and register. Asked by Carlson whether he‚Äôd called in any favors from political figures during his trial, Bankman-Fried denied it. However, the 33-year-old's parents, former Stanford Law School professors Barbara Fried and Joseph Bankman, have reportedly been meeting with lawyers and other people in U.S. President Donald Trump's orbit in an attempt to secure their son a presidential pardon. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a long story there. It involves a law firm that took a pretty unusual and active role in the case, before I even gave up control of FTX, before it was ever filed for bankruptcy, the DOJ had already made up its mind.‚Äù The Google Doc unveiled during Bankman-Fried's trial also suggested he was planning to "talk about how the cartel of lawyers is destroying value and throwing entrepreneurs under the bus in order to cover up the incompetence of lawyers.‚Äù Bankman-Fried recently posted a series of messages on social media about the difficulties of firing employees, in reference to the firings enacted by the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE). Bankman-Fried was criticized by the crypto community for the posts, which were perceived as an attempt to ingratiate himself with the Trump administration.

title: SBF talks crypto from prison: ‚ÄòChanging the guard helps‚Äô
body: In a recent interview from prison with Tucker Carlson, Sam Bankman-Fried, the former CEO of the now-defunct cryptocurrency exchange FTX, shared his perspectives on the current state and future of the cryptocurrency industry. The conversation covered a broad range of topics but primarily focused on regulatory challenges, the evolution of crypto‚Äôs foundational promises, and the potential trajectory of digital currencies in the global financial landscape. You might also like: Core Scientific‚Äôs stock down 11% as Microsoft trims AI contract Regulatory landscape for crypto and US position When asked about the future of crypto in the US, Bankman-Fried emphasized the importance of stable regulatory frameworks for the adoption and growth of cryptocurrencies, particularly in the country. He noted that while the U.S. accounts for about 30% of the world‚Äôs traditional finance, it represents only approximately 5% of global crypto activity. Bankman-Fried acknowledged that the new administration appears more favorable toward cryptocurrency, stating that ‚Äúchanging the guard helps.‚Äù However, he attributed the current challenges to the country‚Äôs strict regulatory environment, saying, ‚ÄúThe reason is entirely regulatory; the U.S. is unique in its difficulty to work with.‚Äù Reflecting on the transition between presidential administrations, Bankman-Fried observed differences in their approaches to crypto regulation. ‚ÄúYou look at what the Trump administration said going into office, there are a lot of good things. There are a lot of things that were very different from the stance [of] the Biden administration,‚Äù he remarked. However, he emphasized that the effectiveness of any administration‚Äôs stance depends on execution, noting that financial regulators are ‚Äúbig, giant bureaucracies in the federal government. They‚Äôre not used to changing overnight, and they have been playing a really obstructive role for a decade in crypto.‚Äù You might also like: New GOP bill targets crypto ‚Äòdebanking‚Äô by limiting regulator oversight The promise of privacy and utility in crypto The discussion also touched upon the original ideals of cryptocurrency, particularly the promise of privacy and individual autonomy in financial transactions. Carlson reminisced about the early days of crypto, saying, ‚ÄúThe whole idea was that this was a currency that could store to the individual his freedom of commerce‚Ä¶ And that obviously hasn‚Äôt happened.‚Äù Bankman-Fried acknowledged this shift, attributing it to the longer timelines required for technological adoption compared to the rapid cycles of investment bubbles. He explained, ‚ÄúTechnology is built out on a decade basis‚Ä¶ Right now, crypto is not quite at a point where it could become an everyday tool of a quarter of the world or something.‚Äù Despite current limitations, Bankman-Fried expressed optimism about the future utility of cryptocurrencies. He envisioned that with continued industry progress, ‚Äúfive, ten years from now, you could imagine a world where all of a sudden it is the case that anyone can have a crypto wallet‚Ä¶ a billion people could use it each day, with privacy, with security, fast, cheap, international.‚Äù You might also like: Sam Altman‚Äôs World Network debuts crypto-enabled chat feature

title: Bhutan's $1B Bitcoin Reserves Fund Salaries, Boost Economy with Hydropower Mining
body: Bhutan's Prime Minister Tshering Tobgay has disclosed that the country's Bitcoin reserves have been instrumental in financing national expenses, including salaries for public servants, healthcare, and environmental projects. This initiative comes as Bhutan faces a decline in tourism revenue. The reserves are supported by the use of 100% clean hydroelectric power to mine Bitcoin, with the nation reportedly holding over $1 billion worth of the cryptocurrency. The Prime Minister highlighted that hundreds of individuals have profited significantly from Bitcoin, questioning why governments are not adopting similar strategies. In his first public remarks on the strategy, the Prime Minister emphasized that the world is progressively moving towards using Bitcoin as a currency and urged other nations to consider its potential for economic resilience. To continue reading this as well as other DeFi and Web3 news, visit us at thedefiant.io

title: SBF appears on Tucker Carlson from prison, plays the victim yet again ‚Äì ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not a criminal‚Äù
body: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried, better known as SBF, made another appearance from MDC Brooklyn correctional facility, where he has been locked up for two years since his trial in 2023. In an interview with Tucker Carlson on Thursday, the convicted criminal tried, once again, to paint himself as a misunderstood genius who just made some bad decisions. SBF called the prison environment ‚Äúdystopian‚Äù but insisted he wasn‚Äôt in any physical danger. Instead, he complained about the lack of productivity, logistical issues, and being stuck in a room with 40 other inmates who have ‚Äúnothing left to care about except trivial matters.‚Äù Throughout the interview, SBF avoided responsibility, as per usual. He talked about how his legal work was nearly impossible to manage due to the prison‚Äôs chaotic schedule, waking up at 4 a.m. just to spend hours in holding cells and transport vans before getting back at 9 p.m. with no access to legal documents. When asked what he does all day, SBF told Tucker that: ‚ÄúI‚Äôve read books. I‚Äôve, you know, started reading novels again. I play some chess and I work on my legal case to the extent I can. You know, there is an appeal going on for me. There are other things I do what work I can from in here on that. But the lack of other meaningful things to spend my time on is one of the most kind of soul crushing things about prison.‚Äù SBF addresses drug rumors and life with inmates Tucker pressed SBF on his hyperactive behavior before his 2023 arrest, asking if he was high on Adderall during media appearances, as rumors had it back then. SBF denied it, saying: ‚ÄúNo, I wasn‚Äôt, but I was pretty out of it. My mind was racing because there were, you know, a billion things to keep track of.‚Äù The convicted felon admitted that because he is autistic, he‚Äôs not very good at communicating, especially when FTX collapsed, and he got ‚Äúswept up in details‚Äù instead of seeing the bigger picture. When asked how life without digital access has affected him, SBF said he missed having access to the internet, but not for leisure‚Äîonly for productivity. He complained about how hard it is to do anything meaningful in prison. Tucker then pointed out that SBF looked healthier and less jittery, possibly because he was forced to step away from screens and stress. Tucker then asked, ‚ÄúSo, like, have you made friends there? How are you hanging with Diddy? I think he‚Äôs in there with you.‚Äù SBF confirmed that Sean ‚ÄúDiddy‚Äù Combs is in the same prison and has been ‚Äúkind to people in the unit.‚Äù When asked how other inmates react to being locked up with two of the most famous prisoners in the world, SBF said some see it as an opportunity to meet people they normally wouldn‚Äôt, though he quickly added that he doesn‚Äôt think about prison that way. SBF then shared an unexpected observation with Tucker. Apparently, a surprising number of ex-gangsters and armed robbers are good at chess, despite not speaking English or finishing school. With a laugh, SBF said he constantly loses games to them. SBF talks about politics, money, and broken alliances Despite donating millions to mostly Democratic political campaigns in 2021 and 2022, SBF was left to rot when he needed help the most. He admitted that, at first, he supported Biden and the Democratic Party, believing they would be the better choice for financial regulation. But after spending years in Washington, SBF was shocked by what he saw. By late 2022, SBF claims he secretly started giving just as much money to Republicans, which he thinks may have backfired. He called former SEC Chair Gary Gensler a ‚Äúnightmare‚Äù, saying the agency blocked crypto companies from registering, making it impossible for companies to comply. When asked why he didn‚Äôt call in favors from political allies when facing charges, SBF said he didn‚Äôt want to do anything inappropriate and that many distanced themselves from him immediately, turning on him. When Tucker asked if he had any money left, SBF said ‚Äúbasically, no.‚Äù He explained that FTX had $15 billion in liabilities and $3 billion in assets at the time of its collapse. SBF has once again insisted that if FTX hadn‚Äôt gone bankrupt, everyone could have been repaid in full with extra billions left for investors. Instead, he blamed the bankruptcy process for making the situation worse, saying assets were ‚Äúdissipated incredibly quickly‚Äù by those in charge, specifically John Ray III. SBF says he was betrayed by his own people According to SBF, nearly all of his former friends, colleagues, and allies abandoned him. He told Tucker that he received ‚Äúnice messages‚Äù from people in D.C. right after the collapse, but by the time his trial started, no one wanted to be in contact with him. SBF claimed that his co-founder, Ryan Salame, was pressured into pleading guilty after prosecutors threatened to charge his pregnant wife. He called the seven-year sentence given to Salame ‚Äúdisgusting‚Äù and accused the US government of operating in bad faith. SBF also shared that none of his former employees have visited him in prison. Tucker asked if this experience had changed his views on effective altruism, the philosophy he once followed, where making money was supposed to help the most people possible. SBF responded that he still believes in it, but he acknowledged that bad execution can make things worse. When asked about the future of crypto, SBF was cautiously optimistic. He said the industry still has potential, but the U.S. government‚Äôs regulatory approach is still uniquely obstructive. SBF pointed out that only 5% of global crypto activity happens in America, despite the country having 30% of the world‚Äôs financial markets. As the interview ended, Tucker joked about SBF‚Äôs new reality, saying he went from running a global crypto empire to trading muffins in prison. SBF admitted that muffins, ramen, and packaged fish serve as currency behind bars, but unlike crypto, they don‚Äôt scale. With a weak laugh, the FTX founder told Tucker, ‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt do a $200 transaction in muffins. Like what? You know, like I mean, it doesn‚Äôt work physically, right? And it‚Äôs unwieldy. Yeah?‚Äù When asked how he plans to spend his 33rd birthday, SBF said he doesn‚Äôt celebrate birthdays, especially not in prison. If he serves his full 25-year sentence, he will be 57 years old when released‚Äîbut with potential reductions, he could be out in his late 40s, said SBF, so he‚Äôs not really interested in birthdays right now. With a sad smile, SBF then admitted to Tucker that he wasn‚Äôt sure if he could survive that long, saying the hardest part is having nothing meaningful to do. Studies suggest that prison reduces life expectancy by three times, meaning SBF‚Äôs real-life expectancy could be closer to 40 years. Meanwhile, SBF‚Äôs family has been calling on the pro-crypto president Donald Trump to pardon him like he did the crypto hero Ross Ulbricht. But so far, Trump hasn‚Äôt even shown any signs that he knows who SBF is. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? Learn how DeFi can help you build steady passive income. Register Now

title: Ondo Finance TVL Surpasses $1 Billion Becoming Largest RWA Platform
body: Ondo Finance, a blockchain infrastructure provider for tokenized assets, has become the largest real-world asset (RWA) by market cap/total value locked (TVL) after surging by 57% in the past 30 days. Ondo‚Äôs $1.026 billion TVL means it controls 24% of the tokenized treasuries market, currently valued at $4.14 billion per RWA.xyz . In an interview with The Defiant, Ian De Bode, Chief Strategy Officer of Ondo Finance, said, "Not only are we the market leader in total value locked for tokenized Treasuries, surpassing $1 billion, but Ondo Finance now accounts for over 80% of the market share by number of holders of tokenized Treasuries." The recent growth within the Ondo Finance ecosystem is likely due to the launch of Ondo Nexus , an initiative designed to unlock instant liquidity for third-party issuers of tokenized treasuries. Ondo launched the initiative on Feb. 3, more than a month ago. To continue reading this as well as other DeFi and Web3 news, visit us at thedefiant.io

title: Crucial Insights: Why China‚Äôs FX Policy Shift Remains Uncertain, Says BofA
body: Is the dragon breathing fire, or just exhaling a puff of smoke? The question of whether China‚Äôs foreign exchange (FX) policy is undergoing a fundamental shift is generating considerable buzz in financial circles. Bank of America (BofA) recently weighed in, suggesting that while changes are afoot, it‚Äôs premature to declare a complete overhaul. For crypto enthusiasts and investors keenly watching global financial trends, understanding China‚Äôs currency maneuvers is absolutely crucial . After all, shifts in major economies ripple across all markets, including the digital asset space. Let‚Äôs dive deep into why BofA is urging caution in interpreting China‚Äôs recent FX actions. Decoding China‚Äôs FX Policy: What‚Äôs the Current Playbook? To understand if there‚Äôs a ‚Äòfundamental change,‚Äô we first need to grasp the existing framework. For years, China‚Äôs FX policy has been characterized by a few key elements, primarily aimed at maintaining stability and control. Think of it as a carefully orchestrated balancing act. Here‚Äôs a simplified breakdown: Managed Floating Exchange Rate: The Chinese Yuan (CNY), also known as Renminbi (RMB), operates under a managed float regime. This means its value is not entirely fixed but is allowed to fluctuate within a band around a central parity rate set daily by the People‚Äôs Bank of China (PBOC). Capital Controls: China maintains capital controls to manage the flow of money in and out of the country. These measures are designed to prevent excessive capital flight or inflows, which could destabilize the economy and the exchange rate . Intervention in FX Markets: The PBOC actively intervenes in the foreign exchange market to influence the Yuan‚Äôs value. This intervention can take various forms, including direct buying or selling of Yuan, adjusting reserve requirements, or using state-owned banks to conduct operations. Focus on Stability: A core objective of China‚Äôs FX policy is to maintain relative stability in the Yuan‚Äôs value. This stability is seen as vital for trade, investment, and overall economic predictability. Essentially, China‚Äôs approach has been about guided evolution, not radical revolution. The goal is to allow the market to play a role, but always within a framework of control and stability. But is this changing? Why BofA Says ‚ÄòToo Early‚Äô: Examining the Nuances of China‚Äôs Actions BofA‚Äôs recent analysis suggests that while there are shifts in China‚Äôs approach, it‚Äôs not yet a ‚Äòfundamental change.‚Äô What are they seeing that leads them to this conclusion? Several factors are at play: Tactical Adjustments vs. Strategic Overhaul: BofA believes that recent actions by China might be tactical adjustments to manage specific economic pressures rather than a complete strategic overhaul of its FX policy. Think of it as fine-tuning the engine rather than rebuilding it from scratch. Global Economic Context: The current global economic landscape is complex, with inflation, interest rate hikes in major economies, and geopolitical uncertainties. China, like other nations, is navigating these turbulent waters. Some FX actions might be responses to these external pressures rather than a desire for a new long-term policy direction. Data Dependency: BofA emphasizes the need for more data and sustained observation over a longer period. Short-term fluctuations and policy responses can be misleading. A true ‚Äòfundamental change‚Äô would require consistent policy shifts over time, not just isolated incidents. No Clear Signal of Policy Doctrine Shift: Crucially, BofA points out that there hasn‚Äôt been a clear communication or signal from Chinese authorities indicating a fundamental shift in their long-held FX policy doctrine. Policy changes of this magnitude are usually accompanied by some level of official communication or guidance. In essence, BofA‚Äôs stance is one of prudent observation. They acknowledge changes but argue against jumping to conclusions about a complete policy transformation without more concrete evidence and sustained trends. The Role of Yuan Stability in China‚Äôs Economic Strategy Yuan stability is not just a matter of currency valuation for China; it‚Äôs deeply intertwined with its broader economic and geopolitical strategy. A stable Yuan is seen as beneficial for several reasons: Trade Competitiveness: A stable and predictable Yuan facilitates international trade. Excessive volatility can create uncertainty for businesses involved in import and export activities. Attracting Foreign Investment: A stable currency can make China a more attractive destination for foreign direct investment (FDI). Investors prefer stable environments where currency fluctuations don‚Äôt erode their returns. Managing Inflation: Exchange rate stability can help manage imported inflation. A weaker Yuan can make imports more expensive, potentially fueling domestic inflation. Financial System Stability: Sudden and sharp currency depreciations can trigger capital outflows and create instability in the financial system. Maintaining stability is crucial for overall financial health. Global Currency Ambitions: China has ambitions for the Yuan to play a greater role in the global financial system. Yuan stability is seen as a prerequisite for building trust and confidence in the currency internationally. Therefore, any perceived shift in China‚Äôs FX policy must be viewed in the context of these broader strategic objectives. Is China willing to sacrifice some stability for other goals? That‚Äôs the million-dollar question. Currency Intervention: Still a Key Tool in China‚Äôs Arsenal? Currency intervention has been a hallmark of China‚Äôs FX policy toolkit. The PBOC has historically been willing to step into the market to influence the Yuan‚Äôs direction. Is this changing? Here‚Äôs what to consider: Effectiveness of Intervention: The effectiveness of currency intervention can vary depending on market conditions and the scale of intervention. In some cases, intervention can be highly effective in stemming depreciation pressures or guiding the currency in a desired direction. In other situations, it might have a more limited impact, especially against strong market forces. Cost of Intervention: Intervention is not without cost. It can involve the use of foreign exchange reserves, which are finite resources. Sustained and large-scale intervention can deplete reserves and may not always be sustainable in the long run. Signaling Effect: Even if the direct impact of intervention is limited, it can send a powerful signal to the market about the authorities‚Äô intentions. This signaling effect can sometimes be as important as the actual intervention itself. Shifting Tactics?: It‚Äôs possible that China is evolving its intervention tactics rather than abandoning intervention altogether. They might be becoming more nuanced and targeted in their approach, intervening less frequently but more strategically. So, while the fundamental willingness to intervene likely remains, the frequency, scale, and methods of currency intervention might be adapting to changing circumstances. Capital Controls: Loosening or Tightening the Reins? Capital controls are another crucial aspect of China‚Äôs FX management. Are we seeing a relaxation or tightening of these controls? The picture is complex: Balancing Act: China faces a constant balancing act between attracting foreign investment and managing capital flows. Looser capital controls can attract more investment but also increase the risk of capital flight. Tighter controls can limit capital flight but might deter some foreign investors. Selective Liberalization: China has been pursuing a path of selective liberalization of capital controls , opening up certain channels while maintaining restrictions in other areas. For example, there has been some easing of restrictions for portfolio investment through schemes like Stock Connect and Bond Connect. Crackdowns on Illicit Flows: Simultaneously, China has been cracking down on illicit capital flows and tightening enforcement of existing regulations. This reflects a concern about illegal activities and the potential for capital flight through unofficial channels. Geopolitical Considerations: Geopolitical tensions and uncertainties can also influence China‚Äôs approach to capital controls . In times of heightened global uncertainty, there might be a tendency to tighten controls to safeguard financial stability. Therefore, the trajectory of capital controls in China is not necessarily linear. It‚Äôs likely to be a dynamic process influenced by both economic and geopolitical factors, with periods of selective easing and targeted tightening. Actionable Insights: What Does This Mean for Crypto and Forex Traders? For those involved in crypto and forex trading, understanding the nuances of China‚Äôs FX policy and potential shifts is vital. Here are some actionable insights: Monitor Yuan Volatility: Keep a close eye on the Yuan‚Äôs volatility, especially against major currencies like the US dollar. Increased volatility can create trading opportunities but also heightened risks. Track PBOC Actions: Pay attention to announcements and actions by the PBOC related to FX policy. Any signals of policy shifts, even subtle ones, can have market implications. Analyze Capital Flow Data: Monitor data on capital flows in and out of China. Changes in these flows can provide clues about underlying trends and potential policy responses. Consider Geopolitical Factors: Be aware of geopolitical developments that could influence China‚Äôs FX policy. Trade tensions, international relations, and global economic events can all play a role. Diversification Strategy: In an environment of uncertainty about China‚Äôs FX policy, diversification is key. Don‚Äôt put all your eggs in one basket. Spread your investments across different asset classes and markets to mitigate risks. China‚Äôs FX policy is a complex and evolving landscape. While BofA suggests it‚Äôs too early to declare a fundamental change, the situation is dynamic and warrants careful observation. For crypto and forex traders, staying informed and adaptable is the name of the game. Conclusion: Navigating the Uncertainties of China‚Äôs Currency Path The question of whether China‚Äôs FX policy has fundamentally changed remains shrouded in uncertainty . BofA‚Äôs cautious stance serves as a valuable reminder to avoid premature conclusions. While tactical adjustments are likely underway, a complete overhaul of long-standing policy doctrines is not yet confirmed. Yuan stability , currency intervention , and capital controls remain key pillars of China‚Äôs approach, though the nuances of their application may be evolving. For investors and traders, especially in the volatile crypto market, this means navigating a landscape of watchful waiting. Continuous monitoring of data, policy signals, and global economic trends is essential to anticipate and adapt to any shifts in China‚Äôs currency path. The dragon‚Äôs next move in the FX arena remains a story yet to be fully written.
